title: "Diamond and Silk" sisters tell lawmakers "censorship is no hoax"
text:
"Diamond and Silk" sisters tell lawmakers "censorship is no hoax" 1:08am BST - 01:32
Social media personalities Lynnette ''Diamond'' Hardaway and Rochelle ''Silk'' Richardson told the House Judiciary Committee on Thursday that Facebook and other social media websites were trying to ''silence'' their conservative voices and free speech with certain algorithms. Rough Cut (no reporter narration).
